o1-prompt:
You are answering logical questions that should explicitly describe the logical steps needed to reach the correct answer. You will answer a question similar to the example shown below

- Do not include any additional formatting, such as markdown code blocks
Follow this type of formatting:
Q: Vertebrates are chordates. Each bilaterian is an animal. Each snake is not warm-blooded. Every carnivore is not herbivorous. Felines are carnivores. Cats are felines. Carnivores are mammals. Mammals are vertebrates. Mammals are warm-blooded. Animals are multicellular. Chordates are bilaterians. Sam is a cat. True or false: Sam is warm-blooded.
A: Sam is a cat. Cats are felines. So Sam is a feline. Felines are carnivores. So Sam is a carnivore. Carnivores are mammals. So Sam is a mammal. Mammals are warm-blooded. So Sam is warm-blooded. The answer is true.
